body.name: Video Tripod System, Regetek 72 Inch Professional Heavy Duty Aluminum Adjustable Photography Camera Tripod Stand with 360 Degree Fluid Drag Pan Head & Carry Bag for for Canon Nikon DV DSLR Camcorder
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 41 mins
features: 【Large Load Capacity】A 72-inch Professional Video Tripod System Supports 33 LB: designed for DSLR Cameras,Video Camcorders,most tripod, camera slider, jib or crane, Cine-Cams and its various attachments, HDSLR and interchangeable lens cameras. Adjustable tripod height for different photography requirement.

【Sturdy & Stable Professional DV Camera Tripod】Heavy Duty High Strength 3-section Aluminum Twin Tube Tripod withMid-Level Spreader. aluminum alloy construction; Upgraded 0.78" (20mm) max. tube diameter. Supper wear-resisting skidproof rubber base; Locking buckles.

【Fluid Drag Ball Head】Precise Camera Position Control: pre-set counterbalance, fixed fluid drags in both the pan and tilt axes, offers 360° panning and +90° / -60° tilt; Adjustable handle for easy angle adjustment.Built-in bubble level for horizontal position check.Support Left/Right Bar Handle.

【Universal Compatible Quick Release】Each quick release plates comes with 1/4 and 3/8 screws for easy on and off connections, Non-slip gaskets for protecting and loading equipment better. Compatible with Canon, Samsung, Olympus, Panasonic & Pentax most digital cameras, video cameras.
【Compact and Portable】The tripod kit comes with a carry bag for easy transport.

productInformation.name: Tripod Head Type
productInformation.value: Pan Heads, Fluid Heads, Ball Heads

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This Video Camera Tripod is steady, durable, and easy to handle. Its main features include compatibility with Universal products, a maximum load capacity of 22 lb, leg angle adjustment notch, easily foldable, and it comes with a carry case. This tripod has a smooth 360 Degree Rotation fluid head, stands at a maximum height of 72 inches, and is made of durable aluminum. Features: -- Heavy duty Aluminum Alloy solid and durable construction -- 360 degree dial of swivel ball head with bubble level provides you with a panoramic view -- 1/4 inch and 3/8 inch screw Compatible with many DSLR cameras,video,digital cameras, HDSLR and interchangeable lens cameras. -- fluid head for video, smooth pan & tilt shots for all PTZ needs -- shooting from -60 degree to 90 degree -- Extends to 72 inches, folds to 32.28 inches -- Max load weight:22 lbs -- mid-level spreader provides enhanced stability by holding the tripod legs in locked position -- Flip lock button can adjust and lock the shooting height any time -- Adjustable handle can be installed on the right or left of head for easy angle adjustment. -- water resistant protective carry bag with handles & shoulder strap for convenient storage and transportation.

Specifications: -- Material:aluminum alloy -- Folded Height:34.64" -- Max. Tube Dia.: 0.78" -- Tilt Range:-60°to 90° -- Pan Range:360° -- Number of Leg Sections:3 -- Weight:8.7 lbs Package Contents: -- 1x Tripod -- 1x Carrying Bag -- 1x Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have the older model of this tripod, which has been discontinued. Since 2018, I have subjected it to way more use and abuse than it was designed for. I had to replace the bolts which were worn thin last year, which the hardware is easy to find at a local hardware store. In 2022, right before a trip to Montana the inner leg brace on my tripod broke. Customer service handled my claim quickly and sent me a replacement part which arrived just in time. Despite buying my tripod four years prior, they gave me the part free of charge and paid for the shipping. Couldn't be happier.The only cons to this tripod system that I have found, is that if not leveled perfectly the system can be somewhat shaky in windy conditions. By this I mean, you can notice some swaying in the video but its no where to the point where the tripod could tip over. The other issue I have found is that under lots of use, the bolts can loosen and need to be tightened regularly. Luckily if a piece of hardware does fall off, its a standard size and replacements can be found at any hardware store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, smooth fluid head, lightweight
reviews.reviewText: I just received this Regetek tripod and I have to say while I haven't field tested it yet, this thing is awesome and worth every penny. Seems extremely sturdy, the fluid head moves very smoothly and reminds me of the pricier options at a fraction of the cost. All this and its pretty light, or about as light as you would want it without sacrificing the sturdiness of it, and the travel case provides some added protection for your new sticks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Customer service A+
reviews.reviewText: Had a slight issue with mine and the customer service was very helpful fixing the problem. Great tripod. Great seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong Quality Tripod
reviews.reviewText: I have had and been using this tripod since 2019. It is used to record our church services. I completely love this tripod. It is as steady as a rock and is so smooth in operation. I get many complaints on the quality of the video that I shoot, and none of it would be possible without the sturdiness and smooth operation of this tripod for video purposes. I even used it for recording a night rocket launch. Outside the it is so sturdy, that the wind does not move it at all, rock solid.Recently when cleaning it, the pin on one of the foot pads broke off. I contacted customer support and they immediately sent me not one but all three new footpads at no charge!Fantastic Product and Fantastic quality support. A n Awesome Product with Awesome Support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Loose Screw Fell Out and Got Lost
reviews.reviewText: Product is sturdy and functions well EXCEPT that a screw was loose when it arrived, fell out, and now the tripod slips down on one of the three sides, making it useless unless used in a totally lowered height. I cannot find how to reach the company for a replacement part.REGETEK, please contact me and tell me how to get a replacement screw for one of the top adjustment levers. It’s a machine screw. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Robust - stout tripod
reviews.reviewText: I like the robust, stout frame of this tripod. It is really stable and it has ability to anchor with either steel pointed tips or plastic foot pads. It is mostly made of aluminum, although the connections from one part to another are either bakelite or plastic. I also very much liked their customer service. I was able to e-mail Regetek and ask numerous questions before I bought this tripod. The product is rated for use between -20 Celsius to +70 Celsius.Do not recommend it being used below 40 degrees Fahrenheit, because some of the plastic connections become brittle when colder. I understand this is a new product, and Regetek customer service was most gracious in providing answers to my questions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this tripod for creating YouTube videos but ended up using it for my (other hobby) indoor studio portraits as well. The tripod arrived in a timely manner via Amazon. It was professionally packaged to prevent damage. The tripod is heavy and comes with a cover bag which is nice for photoshoots on-location. It can handle my DSLR, Zoom lens, Mic, Panel lights and Ronin S. I've been using it for a couple of months now before leaving a review. It's reliable, sturdy and well-made. The tripod is easily adjustable. I would highly recommend it for professional videographers. Overall, I love this tripod and would highly recommend it. I would definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Carrying case sucks!! Great tripod!!
reviews.reviewText: Tripod it self is great!! The carrying case it not!! That rip showed up the 3rd day I had it. Was very busy at the time and missed the window to ask for a new one!😢😢

I can't say enough about the built quality. This tripod can be placed in the professional category.Solid and come fully assembled in its travel bag.Make no mistake it's a heavy tripod, so if you are backpacking it will weigh you down. But for me who plan to do a lot of long exposure photography as a hobby this is perfect for my planned road trip journeys.If I have to travel lite I have a small lite tripod for that.Completely blown away by this tripod. Just to add, i received exactly what was advertised. I saw a comment from one buyer who said they received a different design, thankfully not in my case.Totally recommend it 👌

reviews.reviewTitle: コストパフォーマンス最高、機能十分
reviews.reviewText: しっかりした三脚を探しておりたどり着きました。六角レンチ必須ですが、コストパフォーマンスに優れた一品です。

I do videography and had been wanting to upgrade my small, portable tripods for something more sturdy and professional looking. I did not want to splurge for a branded one. I settled on the Regetek one. Let me tell you I have no regrets. The tripod feels great and looks great. It comes with the perfect bag to carry it. It's on the heavier side, but that's what you want when you're going to mount a few thousand dollars of equipment on it. I'm seriously impressed with this one.

reviews.reviewTitle: クイックリリースプレートのこと
reviews.reviewText: 今迄沢山の三脚を購入、使用してきたが、今回のRG60A01が最も素晴らしいです。使用カメラは一台ではなく撮影にはいつも二台持っていくので、クイックリリースプレートが2個必要、手に入れる方法を教えてください

reviews.reviewTitle: It’s good, but was expecting more
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good stand but I was expecting a bit more. A little disappointed with the head but overall a good tripod. The legs are very sturdy.
